title: The Double Ledger
outcome: Leaked documents reveal a shadow ledger chronicling how the Directorate abused BCI data for secret punishments and blackmail. The ghost assembly and public demand truth and reparations. Council members and Directorate are exposed, leading to public tribunals that force a city-wide reckoning and new leadership.

events.description: Encrypted files containing the BCI shadow ledger leak to the ghost assembly, exposing blacklists and manufactured scores used for leverage and punishments.
Protests erupt citywide as excerpts from the ledger circulate on social media. Citizens demand reparations and public confession from Council and Directorate members.
Public tribunal sessions begin. Oksana Lintz testifies, admitting partial knowledge and apologizing, while Daria Tomenko tries to deny wrongdoing, losing the crowd’s support.
Council members step down or are removed as citywide votes start to select interim leadership for a new civic charter. BCI is suspended pending audit and public review.
Grassroots leaders and ghost assembly begin rewriting city rules in open forums, focusing on reparations and redefining citizen oversight over future digital governance.
